aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by whether the tag and value pair is provided with the action

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag and value pair associated with an Amazon EMR resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by whether the tag keys are provided with the action regardless of tag value

elasticmapreduce:ExecutionRoleArn.description: Filters access by whether the execution role ARN is provided with the action

elasticmapreduce:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by whether the tag and value pair is provided with the action

elasticmapreduce:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tag and value pair associated with an Amazon EMR resource
